posts.content:
Walking the dark and evil path in search of lands to conquer and pillage PvM/E 1-40

Medieval Marauder (Dark Blade)
Blackguard(4), Fighter(14), Weapon Master(22)
By Tyr Templar

Concept: The Dark Blade is a conqueror, in search of lands to enslave and pillage, with minions (summons) to do his/her evil bidding. High/PG Melee AB and exceptional damage output thanks to the WM crit. factor bolstered by Fighter (WS/EWS), Divine Might, and devastating crit (all the better to conquer lands and spoil their riches), with a little sneak damage as well. Has a nice AC for a melee thanks to Divine Shield (enhance with charisma), with Expertise for more. While there’s no such thing as too much saves, saves are decent (excluding will, which you’ll want to shore up with clarity potions, as is typical of melee builds); this, thanks to Dark Blessing (adds CHA to saves, such that you can enhance saves by adding more CHA, which also contributes/enhances your DM and DS as well, along with your Smite (AB) boni, too). Main drawback (or dark blessing as the case may be) is that the Dark Blade is EVIL, and what Smiting Paladins live for when it comes to PvP (forewarned is forearmed).

Without any further ado, please meet:

Medieval Marauder (Dark Blade)
Blackguard(4), Fighter(14), Weapon Master(22)

*Don’t Want Devastating Critical? No Problem.
If uninterested in Dev.Crit, then drop Grt.Cleave, OC and DC, taking IKD at level 20 (instead of Grt.Cleave), bumping EP to Lvl. 31 (instead of OC), and AS to level 34 (instead of DC), and grab Epic Toughness at level 37, 40, for IKD and more HPs (440 adjusted) in lieu of Dev.Crit, or other feats of your own choosing instead.

**Weapon Choice: If going the dev.crit path, might I recommend a Scimitar (for its threat range, landing the crits thus forcing the saves against insta-death, while enabling the use of a Tower Shield); if not going dev.crit, then consider the Greatsword or even the Greataxe ( just looks right on a BG build), or otherwise as you may prefer, weapons being a matter of personal choice.

--------

III Basics:
a. Hitpoints: 400

b. Saving Throws (v. Spells)
Fort: 26 (30)
Will: 18 (22)
Reflex: 23 (27)

Other: Dark Blessing (enhance with Charisma)

IV Combat Vitals:
a. Devastating Critical (DC): 41, +2 Bull’s: 43 (Bio-Cap: 47)

b. Attack Bonus (AB):
BAB: 30, AB: 50, +2 BG Bull's: 52 (melee), +3 Smite Good

c. Damage—Comparative:

*Mundane Scimitar:
1-6+17, +2 Bull’s, +3 DM, OR: 1-6+19, +3 Divine (crit: 13-20/x3) (Keen: 10-20/x3), +1d6 Sneak.

*Mundane Greatsword:
2-12+22, +3 Bull’s, +3 DM, OR: 2-12+25, +3 Divine (crit: 15-20/x3) (Keen: 13-20/x3), +1d6 Sneak.

*Mundane Greataxe:
1-12+22, +3 Bull’s, +3 DM, OR: 1-12+25, +3 Divine (crit: 17-20/x4) (Keen: 16-20/x4), +1d6 Sneak

Other: PA Mode (+5 damage, -5 ab), BG Summons, Smite Good, +4

V Defense Vitals(AC):
AC 17, +8 Mundane Plate, +3 Mundane Tower: 28, +3 Divine Shield: 31 AC
+5 Expertise Mode (-5 ab): 36 AC

VI Skillpoints: 172*
Deadly Trap Set: Disable Trap 1(4), Discipline 43(54), Heal 2(1), Hide 5(6), Intimidate 4(7), Search 1(2), Set Trap 14(15), Spellcraft 19(20), Tumble 20(21)

Detection Set: Discipline 43(54), Hide 5(6) (BG prereq), Intimidate 4(7) (WM prereq), Listen 43(42), Spellcraft 14(15), Tumble 20(21)

*Players should feel free to adjust their Dark Blade to suit their own tastes/environs, as always.

Slash, Crit and CONQUER ON! ~ Tyr
